VRDisplayCapabilities.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The VRDisplayCapabilities interface of the WebVR API describes the capabilities of a — its features can be used to perform VR device capability tests, for example can it return position information.

blockquote.para: Note: This interface was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

remarks.para: This interface is accessible through the property.
